title: My shop reset
body:
I just saw on league of legends news that my shop is not working due to bug or something and they are trying to fix the issue.
I was wondering if I can get my old shop back because I had skins that I like . Thanks

replies.body: Yeah it looks like the personalized shop ran into problems, and have been disabled for now.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if your shop was reset and saw something you liked.  I can't make any guarantees, but our specialist can look into honoring it for you.  See you there!
when is the shop coming back? it's been disabled for a while now
I don't really know I'm afraid, but hopefully it's right around the corner!
Noooo! I didnt take a picture! My shop isn't up yet. I had championship Shyvanna and Winter lulu int here that I was going to purchase today! Why did it disable it?!

The disabled it because the vast majority of players were getting deals for stuff that didn't make sense.

As _Porocles_ wrote above, just send in a ticket and ask them about the specific deal you remember (even if you don't have a picture) since they have the record of all of the old shops.^^
You have to have a pic of what you had it seems not sure thats what i been seeing.
I have a pic but it was taken from my phone with no sum name -.- does it work anyway ?

Yeah it will work i posted on the boards to you just need the pic of your deals and send also a support ticket saying what you want before the reset like which skins you want to keep and the others you dont want are suppose to reset.
